alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 4:19AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central New Hanover and southeastern Brunswick Counties through 500 AM EDT... At 417 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Holden Beach, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts at 35 to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oak Island, Carolina Beach, Kure Beach, Holden Beach, Caswell Beach, Bald Head Island, Snows Cut, Ocean Crest Pier, Yaupon Beach, South Masonboro Island, Boiling Spring Lakes, St. James, Southport, Fort Fisher, Mill Creek, Sea Breeze, Long Beach, Winnabow, Myrtle Grove and Varnamtown. This includes US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 30 and 36. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover
